directoryParameter.name: installdir
directoryParameter.title: Installation Directory
directoryParameter.explanation: Please specify the installation directory for jdbcAdapter.

parameterGroup.name: Property
parameterGroup.title: Altibase Adapter for JDBC Property Settings: ALA

stringParameter.name: ala_sender_ip
stringParameter.explanation: This is the IP address of the server on which Altibase is installed.

stringParameter.name: ala_receiver_port
stringParameter.explanation: This is the reception port number used by Altibase Adapter.

stringParameter.name: ala_replication_name
stringParameter.explanation: This is the name of the replication object used to send XLOGs generated by Altibase.

stringParameter.name: ala_xlog_pool_size
stringParameter.explanation: This is the amount of memory to allocate for the storage of XLOGs.

parameterGroup.name: Property2
parameterGroup.title: Altibase Adapter for JDBC Property Settings: ALA

choiceParameter.name: ala_socket_type
choiceParameter.explanation: This is the communications protocol used by the ALA library. (ALA_SOCKET_TYPE)

choiceParameter.name: ala_logging_active
choiceParameter.explanation: Would you like the ALA library log messages to be saved to disk?

parameterGroup.name: Property3
parameterGroup.title: Altibase Adapter for JDBC Property Settings: Altibase

stringParameter.name: altibase_user
stringParameter.explanation: This is used to specify the name of a user account with which to connect to Altibase.

stringParameter.name: altibase_password
stringParameter.explanation: This is used to specify the password for the user account through which the connection to Altibase will be established.

stringParameter.name: altibase_ip
stringParameter.explanation: This is the IP address of the server on which Altibase is installed.

stringParameter.name: altibase_port
stringParameter.explanation: This is the number of the port at which Altibase listens.

parameterGroup.name: Property4
parameterGroup.title: Altibase Adapter for JDBC Property Settings: Other Database

labelParameter.name: desc_skip_dml
labelParameter.explanation: Enabling these properties will prevent DML(INSERT/UPDATE/DELETE) statements that are executed on the Altibase database from also being executed on the other database.

choiceParameter.name: other_database_skip_insert
choiceParameter.description: Do you want to enable the OTHER_DATABASE_SKIP_INSERT property?

choiceParameter.name: other_database_skip_update
choiceParameter.description: Do you want to enable the OTHER_DATABASE_SKIP_UPDATE property?

choiceParameter.name: other_database_skip_delete
choiceParameter.description: Do you want to enable the OTHER_DATABASE_SKIP_DELETE property?

parameterGroup.name: Property5
parameterGroup.title: Altibase Adapter for JDBC Property Settings: Other Database

choiceParameter.name: other_database_group_commit
choiceParameter.description: Do you want to enable the OTHER_DATABASE_GROUP_COMMIT property?
choiceParameter.explanation: "Group Commit" improves overall performance, but increases the amount of time it takes to commit individual transactions. If the OTHER_DATABASE_GROUP_COMMIT property is enabled, multiple Altibase transactions will be committed in the other database at the same time, in order to improve performance.

parameterGroup.name: Property6
parameterGroup.title: Altibase Adapter for JDBC Property Settings: Other Database

stringParameter.name: other_database_batch_dml_max_size
stringParameter.explanation: "Batch DML" means grouping multiple DML statements. This realizes a performance improvement by reducing network costs. To disable Batch DML, set the OTHER_DATABASE_BATCH_DML_MAX_SIZE property to 1.

directoryParameter.name: other_database_jdbc_driver_path
directoryParameter.title: Altibase Adapter for JDBC Property Settings: Other Database
directoryParameter.explanation: Please specify the JDBC Driver directory for other database.

parameterGroup.name: Property7
parameterGroup.title: Altibase Adapter for JDBC Property Settings: Other Database

infoParameter.name: property_report
infoParameter.title: Property Review
infoParameter.value:
To change these properties after installation is complete, please modify the following file : ${installdir}/conf/jdbcAdapter.conf
1. Altibase Adapter for JDBC Property Settings : ALA
1) ALA_SENDER_IP : [${ala_sender_ip}]
2) ALA_RECEIVER_PORT : [${ala_receiver_port}]
3) ALA_REPLICATION_NAME : [${ala_replication_name}]
4) ALA_XLOG_POOL_SIZE : [${ala_xlog_pool_size}]
5) ALA_SOCKET_TYPE : [${ala_socket_type}]
6) ALA_LOGGING_ACTIVE : [${ala_logging_active_tmp}]
2. Altibase Adapter for JDBC Property Settings : Altibase
1) ALTIBASE_USER : [${altibase_user}]
2) ALTIBASE_PASSWORD : [${altibase_password}]
3) ALTIBASE_IP : [${altibase_ip}]
4) ALTIBASE_PORT : [${altibase_port}]
3. Altibase Adapter for JDBC Property Settings : Other Database
1) OTHER_DATABASE_USER : [${other_database_user}]
2) OTHER_DATABASE_PASSWORD : [${other_database_password}]
3) OTHER_DATABASE_SKIP_INSERT : [${skip_insert}]
4) OTHER_DATABASE_SKIP_UPDATE : [${skip_update}]
5) OTHER_DATABASE_SKIP_DELETE : [${skip_delete}]
6) OTHER_DATABASE_GROUP_COMMIT : [${group_commit}]
7) OTHER_DATABASE_BATCH_DML_MAX_SIZE : [${batch_dml_max_size}]
8) OTHER_DATABASE_SET_USER_TO_TABLE : [${set_user_to_table}]
9) OTHER_DATABASE_JDBC_MAX_HEAP_SIZE : [${other_database_jdbc_max_heap_size}]
10) OTHER_DATABASE_JDBC_DRIVER_PATH : [${other_database_jdbc_driver_path}]
11) OTHER_DATABASE_JDBC_DRIVER_CLASS : [${other_database_jdbc_driver_class}]
12) OTHER_DATABASE_JDBC_CONNECTION_URL : [${other_database_jdbc_connection_url}]
